title: Shaonian Ge Xing: Haiwai Xianshan Pian

alternative_titles.ja: 少年歌行 海外仙山篇

synopsis:
When facing adversities, it is essential to maintain a peaceful mindset and remain optimistic. The head of the Lei family tragically passed away after the battle at Lei Family Castle, the Sword Deity thus perished. In an attempt to force himself to use his internal energy, Xiao Se pushed himself to the brink of death. The group embarked on a journey to the mysterious Immortal Mountain overseas to find the legendary deity so that they could save Xiao Se. At the same time, the power struggle between the imperial court and the martial arts world was still going on.

(Source: Youku)
